name: Highway Car 2D
description:
Highway Car 2D with 3 level: City, Snow, Beach

Highway Car 2D is an android car game, with 3 different level City, Snow and Beach. In this game you have upgrade items: Magnet, Shield and Double Coins with upgrade ui. In this project AdMob banner and interstitial is included which you can make money.In this game all assets is free to use but if you dont like you can change with your assets, and is easy to reskin. You have documentacion with all Contents to reskin this game.

Download demo apk here:

Features:
  • AdMob Banner + Interstitial
  • Compatible with all android version
  • Include 9 car sprites
  • 3 Levels: City, Snow and Beach
  • 3 item: Magent, Shield and Double Coins
  • Easy to reskin
What You Get:
  • Highway Car 2D unity project Full source code
  • PNG assets file
  • Documentation File HTML
